name: SILLY NINJA
description:
SILLY NINJA

Will you be able to become a ninja? Can you complete this challenging simulation that KW99 offers you?

Our silly ninja is trying to become a real ninja by crossing the platforms that KW99 gave him. While doing these, he does not neglect to show his dances! Our silly ninja can neutralize his enemies, either with his little fists or with the buttons KW99 has given him! It's up to him.

GAME INFO

There are 5 levels in total in this game, each level has 3 corridors and 3 different mechanics.

There are 5 mechanics in total and they are laser wall, a large object falling, explosive object, sliding floor, and sliding wall.

There are 10 enemies in total in each level, and after neutralizing these enemies, it is enough to go to KW99 at the end of the level.

--CONTROLS--

For those who do not want to play the tutorial part, I also give the controls here.

Walk and Rotate Character --> W,A,S,D

Run --> LSHIFT

Jump&Double Jump --> SPACE

Rotate Camera--> Mouse

Attack&Combo--> Mouse Left Click

Lock Target--> Mouse Right Click

Dance--> 1,2,3

Press Button --> E

Teleport Spawn Point--> T

Climb Move Left-Right--> A,D

Climb Left Jump --> A+SPACE

Climb Right Jump-->  D+SPACE

Clim Up Jump--> Space

Climbing Top of The Wall--> W

Menu--> ESC
